description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Mexico, Aztec, Spanish and Republican: or historical, geographical, political, statistical and social account of that country from the period of the invasion to the present time: with a view of the ancient Aztec Empire ... a historical sketch of the late war; and notices of New Mexico and California" Author: MAYER, Brantz. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010480.g.17." Volume: 02 Page: 231 Place of Publishing: Hartford Date of Publishing: 1852 Publisher: S. Drake and Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002435996 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
